scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../frontend/ && npm run build && cp -r dist ../backend && echo 'rebuilt UI in Linux'
scripts.wsl:build:ui: wsl rm -rf dist && cd ../frontend/ && npm run build && wsl cp -r dist ../backend && wsl echo 'rebuilt UI in Windows'
scripts.windows:build:ui: rmdir /S /Q dist && cd ../frontend/ && npm run build && xcopy /E /I /Y ../frontend/dist ../backend/dist && echo 'rebuilt UI in Windows'
